text: can install development version OpenAIRE like :

title:
OpenAIRE - Open Scholarly Communication
    Infrastructure Supporting European Research
text: basic example shows retrieve data OpenAIRE search APIs:
code: library(OpenAIRE)  # all projects openaire("projects")  #> # A tibble: 50 × 10 #>    Project tit…¹ Proje…² Proje…³ Funder Fundi…⁴ Fundi…⁵ Fundi…⁶ SC39  Start Da…⁷ #>    <chr>         <chr>   <chr>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <lgl> <date>     #>  1 ONCOGENE ACT… <NA>    N01ES0… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 1986-09-30 #>  2 Semiparametr… <NA>    5R21ES… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 2011-02-01 #>  3 SOUTHWEST ON… <NA>    5U10CA… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 1978-01-01 #>  4 Biological R… <NA>    5R01GM… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 1997-07-01 #>  5 MECHANISM OF… <NA>    5R01CA… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 1995-04-01 #>  6 Mechanisms o… <NA>    1R21AI… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 2012-02-06 #>  7 CORONARY ART… <NA>    1R01HL… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 1987-09-30 #>  8 LAMPoles for… <NA>    7R21AI… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 2015-07-01 #>  9 CHILDRENS IN… <NA>    2R44HL… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 2002-09-01 #> 10 BIOBEHAVIORA… <NA>    5F31MH… NIH    NATION… <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 1994-09-01 #> # … with 40 more rows, 1 more variable: `End Date` <date>, and abbreviated #> #   variable names ¹​`Project title`, ²​`Project Acronym`, ³​`Project ID`, #> #   ⁴​`Funding Stream`, ⁵​`Funding Substream level 1`, #> #   ⁶​`Funding Substream level 2`, ⁷​`Start Date`

title:
OpenAIRE - Open Scholarly Communication
    Infrastructure Supporting European Research
text: Parameters can specified filter search results:
code: # use parameters to filter projects openaire("projects", params = api_params(   format = "tsv",    proj_country = "SE",   proj_org = "Royal Institute of Technology", ))  #> # A tibble: 800 × 10 #>    Project tit…¹ Proje…² Proje…³ Funder Fundi…⁴ Fundi…⁵ Fundi…⁶ SC39  Start Da…⁷ #>    <chr>         <chr>   <chr>   <chr>  <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <lgl> <date>     #>  1 A Higher Dim… <NA>    158937  SNSF   Careers Fellow… Doc.Mo… FALSE 2015-11-01 #>  2 Modeling and… <NA>    181788  SNSF   Careers Fellow… Early … FALSE 2018-08-01 #>  3 Determining … <NA>    EP/R02… UKRI   EPSRC   <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 2018-08-12 #>  4 Topological … <NA>    EP/P02… UKRI   EPSRC   <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 2017-08-31 #>  5 Datasounds, … <NA>    AH/V01… UKRI   AHRC    <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 2022-01-04 #>  6 NI: Microbia… <NA>    NE/S00… UKRI   NERC    <NA>    <NA>    FALSE 2018-12-31 #>  7 Nanodevices … NAQUOP  307687  EC     FP7     SP2     ERC     FALSE 2013-04-01 #>  8 Fiktionalitä… <NA>    119410  SNSF   Careers Intern… <NA>    FALSE 2007-10-01 #>  9 Fluid Spectr… FSA     308267  EC     FP7     SP2     ERC     FALSE 2012-11-01 #> 10 Highly Multi… MULTIP… 615458  EC     FP7     SP2     ERC     FALSE 2014-04-01 #> # … with 790 more rows, 1 more variable: `End Date` <date>, and abbreviated #> #   variable names ¹​`Project title`, ²​`Project Acronym`, ³​`Project ID`, #> #   ⁴​`Funding Stream`, ⁵​`Funding Substream level 1`, #> #   ⁶​`Funding Substream level 2`, ⁷​`Start Date`

text: function provides crawling results, page page:
code: openaire_crawl("projects", page_size = 100, params = api_params(   format = "xml",    proj_country = "SE",   proj_org = "Royal Institute of Technology") ) #> Fetching approximately 801 hits in 9 batches of 100 records #> # A tibble: 801 × 22 #>    collect…¹ origi…² code  title proje…³ beg_d…⁴ end_d…⁵ durat…⁶ ec_ar…⁷ oa_is…⁸ #>    <chr>     <chr>   <chr> <chr> <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   <chr>   #>  1 SNSF - S… snsf__… PA00… Nume… Numeri… 2007-0… 2007-0… 0       false   false   #>  2 SNSF - S… snsf__… 1589… A Hi… A High… 2015-1… 2016-0… 0       false   false   #>  3 SNSF - S… snsf__… 1817… Mode… Modeli… 2018-0… 2020-0… 0       false   false   #>  4 UK Resea… ukri__… EP/R… Dete… Determ… 2018-0… 2021-0… 0       false   false   #>  5 UK Resea… ukri__… EP/P… Topo… Topolo… 2017-0… 2021-0… 0       false   false   #>  6 UK Resea… ukri__… AH/V… Data… Dataso… 2022-0… 2023-0… 0       false   false   #>  7 UK Resea… ukri__… NE/S… NI: … NI: Mi… 2018-1… 2023-0… 0       false   false   #>  8 CORDA - … corda_… 3076… Nano… Nanode… 2013-0… 2018-0… 0       false   false   #>  9 SNSF - S… snsf__… 1194… Fikt… Fiktio… 2007-1… 2007-1… 0       false   false   #> 10 CORDA - … corda_… 3082… Flui… Fluid … 2012-1… 2017-1… 0       false   false   #> # … with 791 more rows, 12 more variables: ec_sc_39 <chr>, summary <chr>, #> #   cost <chr>, funded_amount <chr>, currency <chr>, funder_shortname <chr>, #> #   funder_name <chr>, funder_jurisdiction <chr>, funding_level_0_name <chr>, #> #   data_inferred <chr>, data_deleted <chr>, data_trust <chr>, and abbreviated #> #   variable names ¹​collected_from, ²​original_id, ³​project_title, ⁴​beg_date, #> #   ⁵​end_date, ⁶​duration, ⁷​ec_art_293, ⁸​oa_is_mandated

what: R client for the OpenAIRE APIs — OpenAIRE-package
title: R client for the OpenAIRE APIs — OpenAIRE-package
text: OpenAIRE open science initiative, supports Open Access policy European Commission. R package OpenAIRE provides access within R OpenAIRE RESTful APIs, intended metadata discovery exploration .

title: R client for the OpenAIRE APIs — OpenAIRE-package
text: Markus Skyttner markussk@kth.se Mohamad Bazzi bazzi@kth.se

title: Parameters for the API — api_params
text: Parameters API

title: Parameters for the API — api_params
code: api_params(   size = 10000,   page = NULL,   format = "xml",   model = NULL,   sort_by = NULL,   sort_order = NULL,   has_ec_funding = NULL,   has_wc_funding = NULL,   fp7_scientific_area = NULL,   funder = NULL,   funding_stream = NULL,   proj_grant_id = NULL,   proj_publication_id = NULL,   proj_dataset_id = NULL,   proj_title = NULL,   proj_acronym = NULL,   proj_call_id = NULL,   proj_start_year = NULL,   proj_end_year = NULL,   proj_country = NULL,   proj_org = NULL,   r_sort_by = NULL,   r_doi = NULL,   r_orcid = NULL,   r_from_date = NULL,   r_to_date = NULL,   r_title = NULL,   r_author = NULL,   r_provider_id = NULL,   r_project_id = NULL,   r_has_project = NULL,   r_grant_id = NULL,   r_fp7_grant_id = NULL,   r_is_oa = NULL,   r_country = NULL,   pub_publication_id = NULL,   pub_original_id = NULL,   pub_sdg = NULL,   pub_fos = NULL,   dataset_id = NULL,   software_id = NULL,   other_id = NULL )

title: Parameters for the API — api_params
text: size Number results per page, default 10000 page page return (paging), default NULL format respone format, one "xml", "json", "tsv", "csv", default "xml" model model use, default NULL means "openaire" used, "sygma" simplified version sort_by optional sorting parameter, sorting order specified field, example "projectstartdate,ascending", valid fields "projectstartyear", "projectenddate", "projectendyear", "projectduration" sort_order sorting order, one ascending descending. has_ec_funding logical, use TRUE FALSE projects funded EC has_wc_funding logical, use TRUE FALSE projects funded Wellcome Trust (use funder = "wt") fp7_scientific_area character funder character, use one "WT", "EC", "ARC", "ANDS", "NSF", "FCT", "NHMRC" funding_stream character proj_grant_id character, comma separated list grant identifiers proj_publication_id character, comma separated list OpenAIRE identifiers proj_dataset_id character proj_title character, white-space separated list keywords proj_acronym character, gets project given acronym, proj_call_id character, search projects call identifier proj_start_year character, year formatted YYYY proj_end_year character, year formatted YYYY proj_country character, comma separeted list 2 letter country codes proj_org character, white space separeted list acronyms participating institutions r_sort_by character, sorting order specified field (one "dateofcollection", "resultstoragedate", "resultstoragedate", "resultembargoenddate", "resultembargoendyear", "resultdateofacceptance", "resultacceptanceyear" followed comma "ascending" "descending") r_doi character, comma separated list DOIs r_orcid character, comma separated list ORCID iDs authors r_from_date character, date formatted YYYY-MM-DD r_to_date character, date formatted YYYY-MM-DD r_title character r_author character, white-space separated list names /surnames r_provider_id character, comma separated list OpenAIRE identifiers r_project_id character, comma separated list identifiers, form query semantics r_has_project character, one "true" "false", former variant "true" gets research products link project r_grant_id character, given grant identifier project r_fp7_grant_id character, research products associated FP7 project given grant number r_is_oa character, one "true" "false", OA research products r_country character, two letter country code, "EN" pub_publication_id character, comma separated list OpenAIRE identifiers pub_original_id character, comma separated list original identifiers providers pub_sdg character, number Sustainable Development Goals 1 17 pub_fos character, Field Science classification value https://graph.openaire.eu/develop/athenarc_fos_hierarchy.json dataset_id character, comma separated list OpenAIRE identifiers software_id character, comma separated list OpenAIRE identifiers other_id character, comma separated list OpenAIRE identifiers

title: Parameters for the API — api_params
text: list parameters used API call

what: Available paths in the API — api_paths
title: Available paths in the API — api_paths
text: Available paths API

title: Available paths in the API — api_paths
Available paths in the API — api_paths
text: named character vector entity names API route

title: Retrieve OpenAIRE data for
text: Retrieve OpenAIRE data "projects", "research", "publications", "datasets", "software" ""

title: Retrieve OpenAIRE data for
text: entity one "projects", "research", "publications", "datasets", "software" "" page_size records returned, default 50 params set parameters API, see api_params()

title: Retrieve OpenAIRE data for
text: object results, possible data frame

what: Fetch several pages of results — openaire_crawl

text: Fetch several pages results

title: Fetch several pages of results — openaire_crawl
code: openaire_crawl(   entity = names(api_paths()),   params = api_params(),   page_size = 50L )

title: Fetch several pages of results — openaire_crawl
text: entity one different entity types params list parameters page_size page size, default 50

title: Fetch several pages of results — openaire_crawl
text: data frame possible

text: result calling rhs(lhs).
